input.sentences: [male] loves baseball . it 's his favorite sport .
he won tickets to see his team play .
going down to his seat he got excited seeing the other fans .
looking out over the crowd he could n't wait for the game to start .
when the mascot came out [male] cheered because his team was about to play .
output.sentences: This guy loves baseball.  He is a very big fan of the NY Mets.
For his birthday he received tickets to a Mets game as a present.
He is very excited, as he entered the stadium to find his seats.
The seats gave him an excellent view of the field. Right on the third base line.
The mascot came out to say hi to fans, he was able to get a picture because of how great his seats were.
